channel.title: Atron V.2
channel.description:
[The boring story]
I got bored one day so I started working on a game that would consist of a blue block running from a red block via the arrow keys. ATM you win when you kill your enemy and its quite easy but w/e I think its pretty fun to play.
[download] I didnt add a run.bat or anything just set it up in eclipse.
uppit [url=http://uppit.com/1tkusnkhbrhy/Atron.zip]http://uppit.com/1tkusnkhbrhy/Atron.zip[/url]
[fixing it]
open up the Canvas class and fix the "p" string so it directs to the sprites folder wherever you saved it.
[almost /post] please leave constructive criticism on meh game.
